name: Yum Package Manager (yum) in Image
description: Alert on deployments with the Yum package manager (yum), commonly used in Red Hat-family distributions, present
rationale: Package managers make it easier for attackers to use compromised containers, since they can easily add software.
remediation: Run `rpm -e $(rpm -qa rpm*) $(rpm -qa yum*)` in the image build for production containers.
